name: Mojalisco
description: If you like the flavors of a Dark and Stormy, Moscow Mule, or Mojito, you'll love the Mojalisco.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the mint leaves and Velvet Falernum to a shaker, muddle gently until mint is fragrant but not pulverized. Add tequila, lime juice, and Cynar, then fill shaker 2/3 full with ice. Shake vigorously until the outside of the shaker begins to frost.
Double strain into a Collins glass filled with ice. Top with ginger beer, garnish with mint sprig, and serve.
